pull.title: BIP113: Median Past LockTime
pull.body:
Following the announcement on the ML (https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2015-August/010348.html).

events.body: @afk11 @maaku Ready for merging this? (note you can still update it in a future PR if necessary)
Let me squash some commits first.

events.message: Initial commit of BIP: Median-past Timelock
Added note about compatibility and formatting
Rewrote and clarified some sections of the median time-past BIP.

Update with BIP assignments

Update deployment methodology
